author: dug
msg: Add support for opts on java and script services in the dd.xml file.

author: rubys
msg: Per the spec, 0 and 1 are valid boolean values (and, in fact, are the ones
used by the WhiteMesa implementation).  I updated the BooleanDeserializer
to be very liberal in what it will accept.

author: rubys
msg: Make clear that faults and exceptions are not "OK"
